dolor sit amet,  [1mbold[0m and this    dolor sit amet,
consectetur      is normal text.  consectetur
adipiscing       [3mThis text is[0m     adipiscing
elit, sed do     [3min italics[0m and   elit, sed do
eiusmod tempor   [9mthis one is[0m      eiusmod tempor
incididunt ut    [9mstrikethrough[0m.   incididunt ut
labore et        [31mThis is in a[0m     labore et
dolore magna     [31mred font color.[0m  dolore magna
aliqua. Ut enim  [31m[0mThis is          aliqua. Ut enim
ad minim         double-width     ad minim
veniam, quis     text: 私はフラ   veniam, quis
nostrud          イドポテトです   nostrud
exercitation     。               exercitation
ullamco laboris                   ullamco laboris
nisi                              nisi
